Use of Cookies IFSA-Butler uses Cookies for the purpose of maintaining your session when you provide information to IFSA-Butler through web forms and our application system. Cookies are small pieces of information transferred from our website to your web browser to streamline your experience on our website and allow web servers to recognize the computer used to access the website. Our website does not use cookies to collect personally identifiable information. You can modify your browser settings to decline cookies if you wish to opt out of this service.
